title: The New “ANA & LEXUS CONNECTION” offers Smooth Connections in Comfort between Terminals at Haneda AirportTravelandtourworld.com
text:
The New “ANA & LEXUS CONNECTION” offers Smooth Connections in Comfort between Terminals at Haneda Airport
Japan’s largest airline ANA and luxury vehicle manufacturer, LEXUS, are teaming up to offer the “ANA & LEXUS CONNECTION” service at Haneda Airport in Tokyo starting October 1st, 2015. The new service is designed for first class passengers on ANA international flights from London, Frankfurt and Los Angeles to travel smoothly between the international terminal and ANA’s domestic hub¹ at terminal 2 in the luxury and comfort of a LEXUS vehicle.
ANA, flying under the brand concept “Inspiration of JAPAN” has been awarded multiple times as a global leader in quality. In 2015, the UK-based airline rating company, SKYTRAX, bestowed ANA with its highest overall ranking of 5 stars, in addition to World’s Best Airport Services, both for the third consecutive year.
LEXUS has been awarded the highest luxury brand in Japan for the ninth consecutive year, according to the J.D. Power Asia Pacific 2015 Japan Sales Satisfaction Index Study².
Passengers using the “ANA & LEXUS CONNECTION” service will ride in the LEXUS flagship models, LS or LX³ . In November 2015, for the collaboration with ANA, LEXUS will introduce an LS 600h with blue and white interior colors.
Source:- ANA
